attributes.action: Ensure that HMRC apply consistent data protection standards to all taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We note that HMRC has a higher level of data security for some taxpayers, as reported by the BBC. This is inequitable and we would ask the Prime Minister to ensure that ALL taxpayers have the highest possible levels of data security, particularly in light of recent data loss.
